item.title: 日本生命以 38 亿美元从 AIG 收购 Corebridge 20% 的股份
item.description: 日本生命保险公司表示，已同意以约 38 亿美元现金收购 Corebridge Financial Inc.【原文：Nippon Life Insurance Co. said it has agreed to acquire a 20% stake in Corebridge Financial Inc. for about $3.8 billion in cash, marking its biggest-ever deal as it seeks a foothold in the US.】

item.title: 易捷航空首席执行官伦德格伦将于 25 年离职，首席财务官将接管公司（视频）
item.description: 来源：彭博社来源：彭博社，00:08:20【原文：Source: Bloomberg, 00:08:20】

item.title: 尼日利亚新建大型炼油厂寻求数百万桶美国石油
item.description: 尼日利亚拉各斯附近新建的大型炼油厂正在寻求在明年购买数百万桶美国原油，以提高加工率。【原文：Nigeria’s new mega refinery near Lagos is seeking to buy millions of barrels of US crude over the next year as it ramps up processing rates.】

item.title: 诺和诺德扩大产量，丹麦上调经济增长预期
item.description: 丹麦政府目前预测今年的经济增长率将达到 2.7%，几乎是之前预计的两倍，这主要得益于斯堪的纳维亚国家诺和诺德制药公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）的蓬勃发展。【原文：Denmark’s government now predicts the economy will expand 2.7% this year, almost double the rate it previously estimated, accelerated by the Scandinavian country’s flourishing pharmaceutical company Novo Nordisk A/S.】

item.title: 印度季风适时来临，关注降雨以缓解抑制因素
item.description: 印度预计今年季风开始的时间将略微提前，预计降雨量将高于平均水平，从而有望获得更大的收成，并放宽对一些农作物的出口限制。【原文：India expects the monsoon to start slightly earlier this year, with a forecast for above-average rain raising the prospect for bigger harvests and the easing of export curbs on some crops.】

item.title: 中国周五将与银行和监管机构讨论房地产援助问题
item.description: 据知情人士透露，中国政府计划于周五上午召开主要官员会议，讨论房地产市场问题，包括清理过剩住房库存的建议。【原文：China’s government plans to hold a meeting with key officials on Friday morning to discuss the property market, including a proposal to clear excess housing inventory, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美元涨势面临动力耗尽的风险
item.description: 由于美国物价压力降温和中国经济复苏为交易商提供了抛售理由，美元近期的涨势面临停滞风险。【原文：The dollar’s recent rally is at risk of stalling as cooling US price pressures and China’s recovery give traders a reason to sell.】

item.title: 皮埃尔-安杜兰谈可可短缺、铜价飙升和石油前景
item.description:
著名商品交易商如何进行交易。【原文：

How a famous commodities trader forms his trades.

】

item.title: 世界顶级大宗商品交易商之一称可可可能会枯竭
item.description:
Pierre Andurand 预测巧克力原料将极度短缺。【原文：

Pierre Andurand predicts an extreme shortage of the chocolate ingredient.

】

item.title: 皮埃尔-安杜兰称全球可可库存可能耗尽
item.description:
顶级商品交易员谈巧克力。【原文：

A top commodities trader talks chocolate.

】

item.title: 欧洲央行警告全球大选和地缘政治带来的稳定风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）警告说，地缘政治紧张局势和世界各地的一系列选举正在增加投资者受到负面意外冲击并危及金融稳定的风险。【原文：Geopolitical tensions and a raft of elections around the world are heightening the risk that investors will be jolted by negative surprises and endanger financial stability, the European Central Bank warned.】

item.title: 前官员称中国需要放松对人民币的控制
item.description: 两位前官员本周表示，中国应放松对人民币的控制，因为目前对保持货币稳定的关注限制了可能采取货币政策的空间。【原文：China should relax its control over the yuan as the current focus on keeping the currency stable has limited the scope for possible monetary policy, two former officials said this week.】

item.title: 麦肯锡中国雨人退休，公司高层领导轮换
item.description: 麦肯锡公司（McKinsey & Co.【原文：A top China rainmaker at McKinsey & Co. is leaving the global consulting firm after more than three decades, at a time when it’s reshuffling senior leadership ranks to adapt to a shifting business and political landscape.】

item.title: 瑞士经济增长放缓，出口困境重创工业
item.description: 据瑞士政府首次估计，由于国际需求疲软拖累了出口商，瑞士经济增长在今年年初意外放缓。【原文：Swiss economic growth unexpectedly slowed at the start of the year as weak international demand weighed on exporters, according to a first government estimate.】

item.title: 中国最大的液化天然气买家扩充油轮船队以满足全球需求
item.description: 中国国有石油天然气巨头--中国海洋石油总公司（China National Offshore Oil Corp.【原文：China National Offshore Oil Corp., the country’s state-owned oil and gas giant, is expanding its fleet of LNG carriers to increase its trading power on the global market.】

item.title: 英国顶级劳力士销售商的二手手表销量翻番
item.description: 瑞士手表集团（Watches of Switzerland Group Plc）第四季度劳力士二手手表和其他二手奢侈手表的销售额翻了一番，使其公布的业绩好于投资者的预期。【原文：Watches of Switzerland Group Plc saw sales of used Rolex and other second-hand luxury watches double in the fourth quarter, helping it report better results than investors had feared.】

item.title: 大众汽车合作伙伴更换首席执行官，将重新审视电动汽车电池业务
item.description: 大众汽车公司的主要供应商优美科公司（Umicore SA）更换了首席执行官，并将重新评估其电池材料业务的支出计划，原因是整个行业的电动汽车需求放缓。【原文：Umicore SA, a major supplier to Volkswagen AG, replaced its chief executive and will reassess spending plans for its battery materials business due to the industrywide slowdown in electric vehicle demand.】

item.title: 本田首席执行官表示，本田将投资 650 亿美元实现电气化
item.description: 本田汽车公司首席执行官三部俊博（Toshihiro Mibe）周四表示，公司将在2030年前投资10万亿日元（648亿美元），努力向电气化转型。【原文：Honda Motor Co. will invest 10 trillion yen ($64.8 billion) by 2030 in its effort to shift toward electrification, Chief Executive Officer Toshihiro Mibe said Thursday.】

item.title: Segantii 对纳斯达克挂钩 ETF 下了 3.95 亿美元的看跌赌注
item.description: 截至 3 月底，Segantii 资本管理有限公司持有的最多美国证券是对与纳斯达克 100 指数挂钩的交易所交易基金下的 3.95 亿美元看跌赌注。【原文：Segantii Capital Management Ltd.’s top holding of US securities at the end of March was a $395 million bearish wager on an exchange-traded fund linked to the Nasdaq 100 index.】

item.title: 调查显示瑞典通胀预期低于瑞典央行目标
item.description: 根据 Prospera 在瑞典央行决定开始降息后发布的首份调查报告，固定收益投资者预计通胀率将低于瑞典央行的目标。【原文：Fixed-income investors expect inflation to undershoot the Riksbank’s target, according to the first Prospera survey published after the central bank decided to start cutting rates.】

item.title: 挪威财富基金以与战争有关为由将阿达尼港口列入黑名单
item.description: 挪威1.7万亿美元的主权财富基金决定将阿达尼港口和经济特区有限公司（Adani Ports & Special Economic Zone Ltd.）排除在其投资组合之外，理由是该公司与战争和冲突地区的侵犯人权行为存在 "不可接受 "的风险。【原文：Norway’s $1.7 trillion sovereign wealth fund has decided to exclude Adani Ports & Special Economic Zone Ltd. from its portfolio, citing “unacceptable” risks that the company is tied to human rights violations in war and conflict zones.】

item.title: 印度尼西亚银行成为最大的主权债券持有者
item.description: 印度尼西亚中央银行加入了一个独特的俱乐部：本国主权债务的最大所有者。【原文：Indonesia’s central bank has joined an exclusive club: the biggest owners of their nation’s sovereign debt.】

item.title: 收购公司在 IPO 低迷中寻求退出新途径
item.description: 据欧洲最大的收购公司之一称，越来越多的私募股权巨头正在考虑以新的方式退出其投资组合公司，包括私募首次公开募股（IPO）和向竞争对手出售股权，因为他们正在寻找向投资者返还现金的途径。【原文：A growing number of private equity giants are considering new ways of exiting their portfolio companies — from private IPOs to selling their stakes to rivals - as they hunt for ways to return cash to investors, according to one of Europe’s largest buyout firms.】

item.title: 苏黎世第一季度非寿险收入因保费增加而增长
item.description: 苏黎世保险集团（Zurich Insurance Group AG）称，受保费上涨的影响，第一季度财产险和意外险收入同比增长 12%。【原文：Zurich Insurance Group AG said revenue from property and casualty insurance rose 12% in the first quarter on a like-for-like basis, helped by higher premiums.】

item.title: 印度将外汇储备视为管理债券指数流入的主要工具
item.description: 据熟悉印度央行想法的人士称，一旦该国债券被纳入全球指数，印度庞大的外汇储备将成为抵御因预期资金流入激增而引发的任何市场波动的第一道防线。【原文：India’s vast foreign exchange reserves will be the first line of defense against any market volatility arising from an expected surge in inflows once the country’s bonds are included in global indexes, according to people familiar with the central bank’s thinking.】

item.title: 英国富时 100 指数期货显示创纪录涨势仍在延续
item.description: 2024年4月23日星期二，英国伦敦市，伦敦证券交易所集团公司办公中庭的一块板上显示股票价格信息。4 月 21 日（周一），富时 100 指数收盘价创下一年多来的新高，原因是近期股市波动和地缘政治风险促使投资者纷纷涌入英国基准指数中的防御性板块。摄影：Hollie Adams/Bloomberg【原文：Stock price information displayed on a board at the London Stock Exchange Group Plc in the company's office atrium in the City of London, UK, on Tuesday, April 23, 2024. The FTSE 100 Index closed at a record high, on Monday, April 21, for the first time in more than a year, as recent equity market volatility and geopolitical risks prompted investors to pile into the defensive sectors that characterize the UK benchmark. Photographer: Hollie Adams/Bloomberg】

item.title: 日本经济萎缩暗示滞胀风险
item.description: 日本经济在过去三个季度中增长乏力，这表明日本经济有可能向温和的滞胀过渡，而不是向央行长期追求的正增长周期过渡。【原文：Japan’s lack of growth over the last three quarters points to the risk of a sputtering economy transitioning toward a mild bout of stagflation instead of the positive growth cycle long sought by the central bank.】

item.title: 美国收益率下降，日元摆脱干预区
item.description: 最近几周，日元正在远离引发疑似干预的区域走强，这与 2022 年美国经济数据疲软时日本官员的做法开始相似。【原文：The yen is strengthening away from areas that prompted suspected intervention in recent weeks, and it’s starting to look similar to 2022 when weaker US economic data did the job for Japanese officials.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 中国经济持续疲软，西门子工厂订单减少
item.description: 由于中国市场对工厂自动化产品的需求疲软，西门子公司第二财季订单减少，收入停滞不前。【原文：Siemens AG saw orders drop and revenue stagnate in the fiscal second quarter as muted demand for factory-automation products in China continued to weigh on the German manufacturer.】
